title: Become a school or college governor

details.description: Register your application to be a school or college governor - you can help decide how a local school or college is run
details.more_information:
Your work as a governor can include:

  • agreeing budgets, policies and objectives
  • making sure budgets and objectives are being met
  • reviewing the work of senior staff
  • helping to appoint staff

Youâ€™ll be entitled to time off work, but you might not get paid for being a governor.

There is more information on becoming a college governor from the Association of Colleges.
details.introduction: You can fill out an online application form to register your interest in becoming a school or college governor. You’ll hear back when there’s a vacancy in your area.
details.will_continue_on: the SGOSS Governors for Schools website
details.alternate_methods: You can apply direct to your local school or college.
